Package br.ufmg.dcc.pm.uno.model

Package resposible for the model part of MVC design pattern.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArtificialPlayer
    A automated Player that plays by itself
    Card
    Class that represents a Card
    ChangeColor
    Especial type of Card that can be played any time and allows the player to choose the next Color
    ClientPlayer
    A player that Object.wait() on it's turn for some GameUserInterface to make the play for theirself and call Object.notify() on the game
    Deck
    A Deck of a CardGame
    DeckBuilder
    Builder to construct a Deck
    Player
    Class that represents a CardGame Player
    Plus2Card
    A card with the effect of adding two cards to the hand of the next user
    Plus4Card
    A Card with the effect of adding 4 cards to the hand of the next user
    ReverseCard
    A card with the effect of reverting the game rotation
    SkipCard
    A card with the effect of skipping the next player turn
    Table
    Class that represents a UNO Table
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Card.Color  

Package br.ufmg.dcc.pm.uno.model Description

Package resposible for the model part of MVC design pattern. These are basically beans for storing data
Author:
Alexandre Alphonsos Rodrigues Pereira, Jeronimo Nunes Rocha
